contentitemdata.kenticocommunity.newslet.EmailPreviewText: Check out the latest news 📰 from the Kentico community!
contentitemdata.kenticocommunity.newslet.NewsletterEmailIntroContentHTML:
Hey {!ResolveDynamicText("Recipient.FirstName","friend")!},

Kentico community growth has been charting up and to the right 📈 for the past year. We have new members of the Kentico Community Portal, new newsletter subscribers, and new contributions in the form of blog posts, videos, open-source projects, and thoughts on digital marketing shared on LinkedIn.

Maybe you have something you'd like to share with us which is also valuable to the Kentico community. Share it through our community contributions form so we can help you reach a wider audience. It might even show up here in the next Kentico Community Newsletter!

This month we have some of those community contributions to share with you, along with updates to the Kentico Community Portal we think you'll be interested in. 

And, if you'd like to see how we use Xperience's website personalization with the new contribution form, check out the post Using personalization to drive membership growth linked below.

Enjoy!
contentitemdata.kenticocommunity.newslet.NewsletterEmailOutroContentHTML: If you found the information in this newsletter helpful, something looks strange in your email client, or you have news, a video, or blot post to feature in a future newsletter - let us know by giving us some feedback.
